description: Speed is your friend with the Katabatic, as is support, stability, protection, and performance. We’ve paired our lightest midsole ever with their most breathable B-DRY waterproof membrane ever, for a shoe with an amazing ride that not only keeps feet comfortable mile after mile, but also dry every step of the way.
name: Oboz Katabatic Low B-Dry - Mens

specs.value: Abrasion-Resistant Breathable Mesh, B-DRY Waterproof Membrane, Reinforced TPU Overlays| welded & stitched to reduce weight, and provide protection & durability
Proprietary lightweight & high rebound single density EVA, ESS Plate | underfoot protection & tuned stiffness
